title: Bloomberg Markets: Waze Creates Connected Ecosystem
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Waze Creates Connected Ecosystem
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Thais Blumenthal \u0010Head of Global Business Development\u0010Waze\u0010Discussing Connected Citizens Program giving municipal leaders an unprecedented look at real-time road activity, empowering partners to harness real-time driver insights to improve congestion and make better informed planning decisions.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
